content: this beautiful sunflower crossbody bag pattern includes written instructions and photos it is an intermediate level crochet pattern written in english using standard american terms note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own sassy sunflower crochet crossbody bag fast and fun > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern crochet sunflower crossbody bag is approximately 6 5 wide by 29 tall including the strap the bag portion without the strap measures 6 5 wide by 7 5 tall materials needed - worsted weight cotton yarn brand given in pattern - crochet hook size g - 2 1 d rings - tapestry needle pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-crossbody-bag/
